title: Did President Trump Rivuk verify the background of the case of persons with mental illness?
subtitle: In February 2017, President Trump repealed the Obama Statute, which would have made it easier to announce the possibility of selling firearms to persons suffering from certain mental illnesses.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: President Trump signed a bill prohibiting background checks on the Obama era, which would have made it easier to identify potential mentally ill buyers of weapons.
